alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Refugio (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 17 at 3:56AM CDT until March 17 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: The National Weather Service in Corpus Christi has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Goliad County in south central Texas... Northwestern Refugio County in south central Texas... Bee County in south central Texas... * Until 445 AM CDT. * At 355 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beeville, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Beeville, Refugio, Woodsboro, Skidmore, Berclair, Normanna and Blanconia. This includes the following highways... US Highway 181 between mile markers 582 and 608. US Highway 183 between mile markers 644 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 672 and 704. US Highway 77 between mile markers 614 and 630. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
